attributes.additional_details: On the 23rd June 2016, Citizens of this United Kingdom voted to leave the EU. The turnout was one of the highest ever recorded. Subsequently, 498 MPs voted to trigger the process to leave, which the EU was duly notified of.Since then, despite false promises, Politicians have failed in their duty, to deliver. They are consistently blocking the process to leave and can no longer be considered to be a Parliament representing the People's wishes, in as much, as these Citizens no longer respect them.
attributes.background: The British Parliament is wrongfully using its powers to OBSTRUCT the result of the 2016 Referendum. We The Citizens of This United  Kingdom have  lost confidence in this  Parliament, which should be dissolved immediately  and a General Election called.
